buildStep.command:
# Make clean builds for daily builds by removing build folder
rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/libweintek/build/jenkins rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/dserver/build/jenkins rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/gui/build/jenkins

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Setup environment for builds
cd ${WORKSPACE}
rm -rf artifacts mkdir artifacts
rm -rf cppcheck mkdir cppcheck
rm -rf gtest mkdir gtest
cd /home/ci/work/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM} if [ ! -d "${TRIGGER_PARAM_INSTALL_FOLDER}" ]; then cp -r ${TRIGGER_PARAM_BASE_INSTALL_FOLDER} ${TRIGGER_PARAM_INSTALL_FOLDER} fi
cd /home/ci/work/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}/${TRIGGER_PARAM_INSTALL_FOLDER}/bin rm -f dserver* rm -f gui*

# Do static analysis by cppcheck echo "================================ cppcheck ================================ cppcheck ================================ cppcheck ================================"
cd ${WORKSPACE}/cppcheck
cppcheck --enable=all --inconclusive --suppress=syntaxError --xml --xml-version=2 ${WORKSPACE}/libweintek/weintek ${WORKSPACE}/dserver/dserver ${WORKSPACE}/gui/got 2> cppcheck-result.xml

# Build dserver echo "================================ dserver ================================ dserver ================================ dserver ================================"
export DSERVER_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/dserver export LIBWEINTEK_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/libweintek export MARIADB_CONNECTOR_C_PATH=/home/ci/work/mariadb-connector-c export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}/${TRIGGER_PARAM_INSTALL_FOLDER} export BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo
if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-SVR" ]; then export GOOGLE_BREAKPAD_PATH=/home/ci/work/cMT-SVR/google-breakpad fi
if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "cMT3000" ]; then export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi elif [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-iv5" ]; then export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT-iv5/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi fi
cd ${WORKSPACE}/dserver/build if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_DSERVER_BUILD_POLICY}" = "brandnew" ]; then rm -rf jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM} fi if [ ! -d "jenkins" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins fi if [ ! -d "jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM} fi cd jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}
${WORKSPACE}/dserver/build/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}/cmake_dserver.sh ${DSERVER_PATH} ${LIBWEINTEK_PATH} ${MARIADB_CONNECTOR_C_PATH} ${GOOGLE_BREAKPAD_PATH} ${INSTALL_PREFIX} ${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN} ${BUILD_TYPE}
if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_DSERVER_BUILD_POLICY}" = "clean" ]; then make clean fi
make install VERBOSE=1 cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/dserver ${WORKSPACE}/artifacts/dserver.RelWithDebInfo
make install/strip VERBOSE=1 if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "Ubuntu" ]; then export ENCRYPT_NAME=dserver else if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-SVR" ]; then export ENCRYPT_NAME=dserver.cmt elif [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-iv5" ]; then export ENCRYPT_NAME=dserver.iv5 else export ENCRYPT_NAME=dserver.c30 fi /home/ci/work/crypto e ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/dserver ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/${ENCRYPT_NAME} fi cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/${ENCRYPT_NAME} ${WORKSPACE}/artifacts

buildStep.command:
# Unit tests echo "================================ unit-test ================================ unit-test ================================ unit-test ================================"
export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}/${TRIGGER_PARAM_INSTALL_FOLDER} cd ${WORKSPACE}/gtest mkdir test-libweintek mkdir test-dserver mkdir test-got
cd ${WORKSPACE}/gtest/test-libweintek ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/test-libweintek --gtest_output=xml:${WORKSPACE}/gtest/gtest-libweintek.xml
cd ${WORKSPACE}/gtest/test-dserver ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/test-dserver --gtest_output=xml:${WORKSPACE}/gtest/gtest-dserver.xml
cd ${WORKSPACE}/gtest/test-got ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/test-got --gtest_output=xml:${WORKSPACE}/gtest/gtest-got.xml

hudson.tasks.Mailer.recipients: katte@weintek.com paul@weintek.com zen@weintek.com easonwu@weintek.com jeremyhong@weintek.com clydeliu@weintek.com
